casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 10, 2010

[Cite as 02/10/2010 Case Announcements, 2010-Ohio-354.]

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

2009-2128. [State ex rel.] Evans v. Court of Appeals, Tenth Appellate Dist.

In Mandamus. On motion to dismiss. Motion to dismiss granted. Cause dismissed. Motion for leave to join parties denied as moot.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
